concept.title: 246.404 GOVERNMENT CONTRACT QUALITY ASSURANCE FOR ACQUISITIONS AT OR BELOW THE SIMPLIFIED ACQUISITION THRESHOLD.

conbody.p: Do not require Government contract quality assurance at source for contracts or delivery orders valued at or below the simplified acquisition threshold unless the criteria at 246.402 have been met.
